title: [轉] 929 全球集氣反送中 Global Solidarity with Hong Kong
contents:
来源：https://www.facebook.com/globalsolidarityHK/posts/2527229547508547

在海外有条件的葱友可以考虑参加，请注意安全。

【✊ 929 全球反極權：目前已知確認參與城市】
# 929GlobalAntiTotalitarianism: Currently known participating cities

(列表以文字爲最新版本) 截至香港時間9月27號黄昏，以下嘅城市確認喺今個週末將會舉行活動參與全球反極權示威行動，嚟緊我哋會持續更新資訊，整理後再作公佈。如果知道未列出嘅活動，歡迎PM我哋。請分享出去，畀全世界人知道香港人嘅決心。

(Most current list in text below.) Up till evening Hong Kong time on September 27, the following cities have confirmed that there will be events as part of the Global Anti-Totalitarianism protest series. Please contact us if you know of events that aren't on this list. Please share and let the world know we are determined.

=============
